description: Validates an address to be used for 911 calls made with Amazon Chime SDK Voice Connectors. You can use validated addresses in a Presence Information Data Format Location Object file that you include in SIP requests. That helps ensure that addresses are routed to the appropriate Public Safety Answering Point.

parameters.name: StreetNumber
parameters.description: The address street number, such as 200 or 2121.

parameters.name: StreetInfo
parameters.description: The address street information, such as 8th Avenue.

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: The address city, such as Portland.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: The address state, such as ME.

parameters.name: Country
parameters.description: The country in the address being validated as two-letter country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format, such as US. For more information, see ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 in Wikipedia.

nested_items.name: ValidationResult
nested_items.description: Number indicating the result of address validation.
0 - Address validation succeeded.
1 - Address validation succeeded. The address was a close enough match and has been corrected as part of the address object.
2 - Address validation failed. You should re-submit the validation request with candidates from the CandidateAddressList result, if it's a close match.

nested_items.name: AddressExternalId
nested_items.description: The ID that represents the address.

nested_items.name: streetName
nested_items.description: The address street, such as 8th Avenue.

nested_items.name: streetSuffix
nested_items.description: The address suffix, such as the N in 8th Avenue N.

nested_items.name: postDirectional
nested_items.description: An address suffix location, such as the S. Unit A in Central Park S. Unit A.

nested_items.name: preDirectional
nested_items.description: An address prefix location, such as the N in N. Third St.

nested_items.name: streetNumber
nested_items.description: The numeric portion of an address.

nested_items.name: city
nested_items.description: The city of an address.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of an address.

nested_items.name: postalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code of an address.

nested_items.name: postalCodePlus4
nested_items.description: The zip + 4 or postal code + 4 of an address.

nested_items.name: country
nested_items.description: The country of an address.

nested_items.name: CandidateAddressList
nested_items.description: The list of address suggestions..

nested_items.name: streetInfo
nested_items.description: The street information of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: streetNumber
nested_items.description: The numeric portion of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: city
nested_items.description: The city of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: postalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: postalCodePlus4
nested_items.description: The zip + 4 or postal code +4 of the candidate address.

nested_items.name: country
nested_items.description: The country of the candidate address.
